sections.summary:
Senior Mechanical / Piping Designer with over 40 years of progressive design experience in the Petrochemical industry. This experience has been
gained on a variety of projects; Petrochemical, LPG Storage Facility, Polyethylene Plants, Pipeline Pumping and metering stations, Pulp & Paper
Mill Facilities, Sulfur Recovery Units, Storage Tanks and Fire Water Systems.
